api_list.name: Booru
api_list.description:
The Booru Site Search API allows you to explore and discover a vast array of content across various Booru websites. Booru sites are known for hosting a wide range of content, which may include artworks, illustrations, and images, often featuring characters from various fandoms. While some of this content can be explicit, not all Booru sites exclusively host adult material.

Using this API, you can specify your search query and the Booru site you want to explore. The API will return a list of relevant posts that match your query, along with details about each post, such as the direct link to the image, source URL, associated tags, content rating, creation date, and a link to view the full post on the respective Booru site.

Booru sites cater to a diverse community of artists and enthusiasts, making it a valuable resource for those interested in fan art, fanfiction, and creative expression. Be aware that not all content on Booru sites is explicit or adult in nature, and the API provides the flexibility to search for content that aligns with your interests.

Whether you're an artist, collector, or simply curious, the Booru Site Search API offers a convenient way to explore the rich and creative content hosted across various Booru platforms. It enables you to search for content, retrieve post details, and enhance your Booru site experience.
